alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 12:39AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Texas, northern Hansford and northeastern Sherman Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Goodwell, or 10 miles southwest of Guymon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Goodwell, Hardesty and Texhoma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
